description.narrative: Strengthened capacity of Government partners to identify, recognize and measure child poverty and use evidence to design, implement, monitor and resource relevant plans., which contributes to Child Poverty / Public Finance For Children, Economic And Social Policy General, Social Protection, Social Protection And Child Poverty. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2020, girls and boys, particularly the most disadvantaged and excluded, benefit from more equitable and inclusive poverty reduction and social protection systems, policies and programmes.

sector.narrative: Child poverty measurement: support to routine national measurement of monetary and multidimensional child poverty

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Strengthened capacity of Government partners to identify, recognize and measure child poverty and use evidence to design, implement, monitor and resource relevant plans.

description.narrative: Poverty reduction remains a critical part of policy planning by the Government after 2020 as China moves towards addressing poverty in relative and multidimensional terms and strategizes to invest more in human capital development to cope with aging, and economic downturn brought by COVID-19 pandemic. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/07/2020

title.narrative: Number of major events and knowledge products on child poverty with national, sub-national government and think-tanks completed and disseminated
